Token.Abstract: The RKEntityByAttributeCache class provides an in-memory caching mechanism for managed objects instances of an entity in a managed object context with the value of one of the object's attributes acting as the cache key. When loaded, the cache will retrieve all instances of an entity from the store and build a dictionary mapping values for the given cache key attribute to the managed object ID for all objects matching the value. The cache can then be used to quickly retrieve objects by attribute value for the cache key without executing another fetch request against the managed object context. This can provide a large performance improvement when a large number of objects are being retrieved using a particular attribute as the key.
Initializes the receiver with a given entity, attribute, and managed object context.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The Core Data entity description for the managed objects being cached.

Parameter.Name: attributeNames
Parameter.Abstract: An array of attribute names used as the cache keys.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context the cache retrieves the cached objects from.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The receiver, initialized with the given entity, attribute, and managed object context.

Token.Abstract: The Core Data entity description for the managed objects being cached.
The Core Data entity description for the managed objects being cached.
An array of attribute names specifying attributes of the cached entity that act as the cache key.
An array of attribute names specifying attributes of the cached entity that act as the cache key.
The managed object context the receiver fetches cached objects from.
The managed object context the receiver fetches cached objects from.
A Boolean value determining if the receiever monitors the managed object context for changes and updates the cache entries using the notifications emitted.
A Boolean value determining if the receiever monitors the managed object context for changes and updates the cache entries using the notifications emitted.
Loads the cache by finding all instances of the configured entity and building an association between the value of the cached attribute's value and the managed object ID for the object.
Flushes the cache by releasing all cache attribute value to managed object ID associations.
A Boolean value indicating if the cache has loaded associations between cache attribute values and managed object ID's.
Returns a count of the total number of cached objects.
Returns the total number of cached objects whose attributes match the values in the given dictionary of attribute values.

Parameter.Name: attributeValues
Parameter.Abstract: The value for the cache key attribute to retrieve a count of the objects with a matching value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of objects in the cache with the given value for the cache attribute of the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Returns the number of unique attribute values contained within the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of unique attribute values within the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given object is present in the cache.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if object is present in the cache, otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether one of more objects is present in the cache with a given value of the cache key attribute.

Parameter.Name: attributeValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value with which to check the cache for objects with a matching value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if one or more objects with the given value for the cache key attribute is present in the cache, otherwise NO.

Token.Abstract: Returns the first object with a matching value for the cache key attributes in a given managed object context.

Parameter.Name: attributeValues
Parameter.Abstract: A value for the cache key attribute.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to retrieve the object from.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An object with the value of attribute matching attributeValue or nil.

Token.Abstract: Returns the collection of objects with a matching value for the cache key attribute in a given managed object context.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context to retrieve the objects from.

Parameter.Name: attributeValue
Parameter.Abstract: A value for the cache key attribute.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of objects with the value of attribute matching attributeValue or an empty array.

Token.Abstract: Adds a managed object to the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object to add to the cache.

Token.Abstract: Removes a managed object from the cache.

Parameter.Name: object
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object to remove from the cache.
